docs.snippet: An easy commute and some good food made Barclays Center a winner to a couple of Long Islanders. Now, if the Nets can hire the right coach, the couple says, the team can be the arena's equal....

docs.lead_paragraph: Phil Jackson, the No. 1 target in the Nets’ coaching search, told a Web site on Tuesday that he has “no intention” of returning to the bench, although his statement left room for a change of heart.
docs.abstract: Former Los Angeles Lakers coach Phil Jackson says he has 'no intention' of coaching again, but friends say he might return to the bench under the right circumstances.

headline.seo: Phil Jackson Has ‘No Intention’ of Coaching
